onboarding_1.title: Set Up Currency Display and Notifications
onboarding_1.money_question: Would you like amounts to be displayed in Euro or Dollar?

onboarding_1.notifications_question_helper: Stay ahead and take advantage of the best investment opportunities.
onboarding_1.language_question: In which language would you like to use the app?

onboarding_4.title: Fund Your Account
onboarding_4.subtitle_angleEUR: Place your funds in one of the EURO high-yield accounts via bank card, Apple Pay, or Google Pay.
onboarding_4.subtitle_angleUSD: Place your funds in one of the US DOLLAR high-yield accounts via bank card, Apple Pay, or Google Pay.

transactions.title: Your Transaction History
transactions.no_transactions_1: You haven't made any transactions yet.
transactions.no_transactions_2: Fund your checking account or make an investment to get started.
transactions.copied_link: A link to the transaction has been copied to your clipboard

disclaimer: By continuing, you confirm that you have read and accepted

amount_error.title: Incorrect Amount
amount_error.message: Please enter an amount between 5 and 100.

disclaimer.description: Amounts are rounded to the nearest cent (2 decimal places).

main_account.title: Your Checking Account
main_account.description_1: Be the true owner of your funds; only you have the ability to interact with your sovereign Checking Account.
main_account.description_2: You can move money from it to your high-yield accounts.

investment_account.title: Your Investments
investment_account.description_1: This investment behaves like a savings account, but better!
investment_account.description_2: Lock in your funds and earn interest from the first minute. Withdraw at any time.
investment_account.disclaimer: Estimated annual yield and not guaranteed.

transaction.title: This Operation Requires Your Attention
transaction.description: You are about to move {{amount}}{{currency}} from your checking account to your high-yield account. Are you sure you want to continue?

onramp.title: Fund Your Account
onramp.subtitle: Place your funds in your Checking Account via bank card, Apple Pay, or Google Pay.

offramp.title: Withdraw from Your Account
offramp.subtitle: You can retrieve funds from your account by withdrawing via bank card, bank transfer, or Google Pay.
